name: HERB, Intergalactic Fish Master! (minijam91)
description:
Created for Mini Jam 91 - UFO 

Controls -  WASD to move , LMB all other inputs.

Hold LMB to fire your tractor beam, Keep your beam on the shadow of a fish in the water for long enough and start reeling it in! Time your LMB inputs perfectly to hit the 3 Markers to successfully reel the fish in. 

HERB was created for MiniJam 91 , UFO. Where the Limitation was that "Fish" must be included as some form of mechanic. 

Credits -
